title: Joe Doyle (Partial NY Nat’l) LAST PRICE DROP
author: Bpm0014

posts.post_title: Joe Doyle (Partial NY Nat’l) LAST PRICE DROP
posts.post_content: Selling some of my rare T206’s. I believe T206 resident expert Ted Z said that there are about 11 of these in the world.  Caused by an incomplete job of getting rid of NY Nat’l on the printing plate, it’s the next best thing to the ultra rare NY Nat’l. And almost just as rare.... $1200 OBO
